definition: to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage

sentences.english: How Far Will the Oklahoma City Thunder Go in the Playoffs?
sentences.chinese: 雷霆隊能在季後賽的征程中走多遠？

sentences.english: Chesney and Sugarland capped Country Thunder 2007 before a large audience.
sentences.chinese: 切斯尼和糖城封頂大量觀衆前國家雷霆2007。

sentences.english: I have mentioned at least one “perfect storm” brewing on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我已談到地平線上正在醞釀至少一場“雷霆風險”。

sentences.english: Thunderclap cooldown increased from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 雷霆一擊冷卻從4秒增加到6秒。

sentences.english: She raged against her husband for some household affairs.
sentences.chinese: 她爲一些家庭瑣事對丈夫大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Sound like force of a thunderbolt, potential, such as full steam ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聲似雷霆萬鈞，勢如萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: Fire Thunder to play a maximum power of catching up after school kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 發揮上限的烈火雷霆學了後威力趕超菜刀。

sentences.english: When Alex began to discuss, chaussures homme, Richard explosion into a rage.
sentences.chinese: 當阿列克斯開始爭論時，理查德便大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Last night, I stomped into our bedroom ready to turn on my anger at full volume.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，我跺着腳進臥室，準備大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Example: When I told Raymand that someone has taken his candy box away, he went through the roof.
sentences.chinese: 當雷蒙德聽我說他的糖果盒被人拿走的時候大發雷霆。

sentences.english: She often hits the roof because of trifles.
sentences.chinese: 她常爲雞毛蒜皮的小事大發雷霆。

sentences.english: When Alex began to argue, Richard burst into a rage.
sentences.chinese: 當阿列克斯開始爭論時，理查德便大發雷霆。

sentences.english: The piteous moan of reproach was drowned in the angry and menacing roar of the mob.
sentences.chinese: 責難的哀吟，淹沒在人羣雷霆怒吼之中。

sentences.english: The veteran crooner took out his anger over a leaked record on a producer.
sentences.chinese: 這位老牌歌手因唱片歌曲被泄露，向製作人大發雷霆。

sentences.english: Bryant is expected to play tonight against Oklahoma City at Staples Center.
sentences.chinese: 科比期望在今晚對陣雷霆的比賽中亮相斯坦普斯。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
